name: MoveAndDodge
description:
This is my first 3D game, I made it following this tutorial 

After completing the series, I made some adjustments such as camera rotation, locked forward moving, random floor color, coins appear one by one to prevent repeated gameplay and added some sound effects. The game may be too difficult but as you can see on the screenshots, it is possible to win.

I am glad with the results and what I learned making this game will for sure help me creating many others.
